General.Name: Hangzhou Flariant Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Flariant Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of disperse dyes and filter cakes for dyeing of polyester and printing of textiles in China. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Liangkuan  Da
2.Title: CFO, Sec. to the Board & Director
